nodes.text: Zynga Inc. (Zynga) is an American company editing and developing video games for social media and mobile platforms.

On August 21, 2018, it was announced that Zynga would be partnering with Disney to develop a new free-to-play Star Wars mobile game, with the possibility for a second game, as well as taking over Star Wars: Commander operations. Zynga trusted both tasks to its subsidiary NaturalMotion. With the help of BossAlien, and a third studio from Zynga Austin offices, the new game, revealed as Star Wars: Hunters on February 17, 2021, is planned for released in late 2021.
